titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman of the Isle of Ely in Cambridgeshire, to Colonel Roderick Mansel containing an account of the first discovery of the pretended Presbyterian plot at the assizes at Wisbich in the Isle of Ely, upon the 23 day of September 1679.
